entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`remote_podcast_feed_location` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `website` TEXT NOT NULL, `cover` TEXT NOT NULL, `small_cover` TEXT NOT NULL, `latest_episode_date` INTEGER NOT NULL, `remote_image_file_location` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`remote_podcast_feed_location`))

indices.name: index_podcasts_remote_podcast_feed_location
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_podcasts_remote_podcast_feed_location` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`remote_podcast_feed_location`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`remote_podcast_feed_location` TEXT NOT NULL, `description` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`remote_podcast_feed_location`))

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`media_id` TEXT NOT NULL, `guid` TEXT NOT NULL, `title` TEXT NOT NULL, `audio` TEXT NOT NULL, `cover` TEXT NOT NULL, `small_cover` TEXT NOT NULL, `publication_date` INTEGER NOT NULL, `playback_state` INTEGER NOT NULL, `playback_position` INTEGER NOT NULL, `duration` INTEGER NOT NULL, `manually_deleted` INTEGER NOT NULL, `manually_downloaded` INTEGER NOT NULL, `podcast_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `remote_audio_file_location` TEXT NOT NULL, `remote_audio_file_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `remote_cover_file_location` TEXT NOT NULL, `episode_remote_podcast_feed_location` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`media_id`))

indices.name: index_episodes_media_id
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_episodes_media_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`media_id`)

indices.name: index_episodes_publication_date

indices.name: index_episodes_remote_audio_file_location

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`media_id` TEXT NOT NULL, `episode_remote_podcast_feed_location` TEXT NOT NULL, `description` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`media_id`))

indices.name: index_episode_descriptions_media_id

views.createSql: CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT * FROM episodes e WHERE ( SELECT count(*) from episodes e1 WHERE e1.episode_remote_podcast_feed_location = e.episode_remote_podcast_feed_location AND e1.publication_date >= e.publication_date ) <= 5
